overview: Disillusioned roommates, Andrew and Karlie, decide to throw a party to escape the stress of their everyday lives. The beer is flowing, the music is pumping, and everyone turns to their social media to record the event, but when Andrew's conservative Midwestern parents show up unexpectedly, they must pretend it's an all-night Bible study group. The Party is a heartwarming coming of age comedy.
title: The Party
